organization: Estación de Ciencias Mariñas de Toralla - Centre of Marine Research, University of Vigo
extra_site_info: This site is located at the marina of the ECIMAT marine station, where there is a real-time monitoring station for environmental variables (with a 8 years-long time series). It is located in an upwelling region, so phytoplankton blooms related to the upwelling events are frequent from March to September.
